Articles.Content:
For those of you who don't know, Macey Dean is an awe inspiring, mind blowing youtuber you just finished his first season of a KSP series. He does a sort of Narrative Driven Commentary thingy. I don't know how active he is on these forums, so I went ahead and post the playlist for his series here:

If you start watching the series, grab a bowl of popcorn because you'll probably be watching for a while.

Disclaimer: I don't own nor have I contributed to this series. I am just a fan trying to let people know about his work.
The Spirit of Kerbin was destroyed... WOOOOHOOOOO BUUUUURRRRRRRNNNNNNNNNNN!!!!!!!!!!!! *Insert Psycotic Smile Here*

The Spirit of Kerbin was destroyed... WOOOOHOOOOO BUUUUURRRRRRRNNNNNNNNNNN!!!!!!!!!!!! *Insert Psycotic Smile Here*

It was kinda sad.
I saw room for improvement in it, and that ship just took up space in that area, A new and improved capital ship will be up, you watch

The Spirit of Kerbin was destroyed... WOOOOHOOOOO BUUUUURRRRRRRNNNNNNNNNNN!!!!!!!!!!!! *Insert Psycotic Smile Here*

You must work for Hanland.
Actualy no, I would like to hep Spirit Wolf but I honestly think the Spirit was outdated and it was only a matter of time
To be fair, The Spirit of Kerbin is still in operational shape. Not battle shape, but as a makeshift fighter bay it can still do some work.
Macey did mention that he is accepting submissions for the next season...
I always see that thumnail on the side- never really clicked.

I always see that thumnail on the side- never really clicked.

His work is pretty good. They actually featured him in the community spotlight a few weeks back.
I have pleged my corporation mmrd to help spirt wolf we have already made a better battle cruiser more fuel and sent it in an email

I have pleged my corporation mmrd to help spirt wolf we have already made a better battle cruiser more fuel and sent it in an email

I have an idea. Instead of everybody sending his submissions and flooding his message box with submissions, perhaps I could make a thread for SpiritWolf/Hanland craft submissions and then send the link to him via PM or email.

This way all of the potential craft are in one place and he can easily see which ones would work best.

Thoughts?
The old capital ship was flimsy and weak anyways, but you really can't blame the the Vanguard. No ship could hold up to a direct ramming.
That's what I was thinking Chozo. The fact that it's a list of ships he can draw on would be a boon for us all.

That's what I was thinking Chozo. The fact that it's a list of ships he can draw on would be a boon for us all.

It's settled then. For anyone who reads this, I'll be making a thread in the space craft exchange forum (seems to be an appropriate place) for submissions. Keep in mind this is an unofficial thread!

Let's see how many ships we can get!
it could work as an orbital hangar, maybe even able to dock to a future space station if the SOK can be brought to the station via tug.
I'm a longtime fan and wish I could actually make an awesome ship that isn't a fighter!
